column1: Bhachau is a city and a municipality in Kutch district in the state of Gujarat
column2: India.  Bhachau was one of many devastated towns in the Kutch region of the Indian state of Gujarat
column3: during the 1956 Anjar earthquake as well as in the 2001 Gujarat earthquake. As of 2011 it had a population of 39
column5: 647 households.Bhachau is often mentioned in the TV show Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
column6: as the Gada family and the protagonist Jethalal hail from there.

column1: Bhachau is located at 23.28°N 70.35°E﻿ / 23.28; 70.35. It has an average elevation of 41 metres (134 feet).
One of the historical places in Bhachau is the hill of Kathhad Dada.
